price: 91. Now (you believe) while you refused to believe before and you were one of the Mufsidûn (evil-doers, the corrupters).
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
